x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/researchelementdefinition-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/ResearchElementDefinition \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"ResearchElementDefinition","id":"a281e987-cdda-4b72-b822-5ce3b12d46a2","status":"draft","type":"population","characteristic":[{"definitionCodeableConcept":{"text":"Diabetic patients over 65"}}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:19.101+08:00"}}'
